Class Helpers

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String[] array,
                                   int pos,
                                   java.lang.String default_value)
        Gets the value at a specific position in an array or a default value
        Parameters:
        array - Target array
        pos - Position in the array to look for the value
        default_value - Return value iff there are <= pos elements in array
        Returns:
        The string at the given position in the array, or if the array contains fewer elements than the element points out default_value

      • print_err

        public static void print_err(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String expected,
                             java.lang.String got)
        Pretty printer for error messages

        Prints an error message to stderr with hints of expected result and achieved result

        Parameters:
        title - General description of the error
        expected - Hint for what was expected
        got - Explanation of what appeared

      • print_err

        public static void print_err(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String details)
        Pretty printer for error messages

        Prints an error message to stderr with details

        Parameters:
        title - General description of the error
        details - Detailed information about the error
